title: Software Engineer Intern
header: At Intuit, I built migration tools that made it easier and faster for over 1.5 million QuickBooks users to move from Desktop to Online with fewer bugs and smoother onboarding.

title: Software Engineer Intern
header: I aided in building a real-time inventory dashboard for Sephora's US distribution centers, allowing over 1,500 employees to track item stock across U.S. centers while shortening downtime and cutting storage costs.
